short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your tabs and come back to them any time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keepsake lets you store your tabs and come back to them later. Gone are the days of having to minimize windows that you know you won't look at for a week. Store all of the tabs you want to come back to (way) later and open your keepsake when you're ready to come back to them!
